title: Fragment, 13th–15th century
medium:
Medium: linen, tin
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation
description: Repeating pattern in silver printed on a deep blue ground. Off-set tear-shaped framing devices with vine-and-leaf convention enclose stylized palmettes.  Much smaller inverted tear-shaped motifs containing rosettes in the interstices.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 13th–15th century.
13th–15th century. Medium: linen, tin
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-932.
